author: (Mike Nichols)
title: Cable supplier expands footprint
text:
Michigan Sales & Use Tax Empire is a maker of custom cable assemblies and supplier of electrical products. Photo via fb.com 
A supplier of cable products based on the east side of the state is expanding its local presence. 
Empire in Rochester Hills, which also supplies electrical, network and safety products, has leased a 10,000-square-foot space in Grand Rapids, at 2960 South Wilson Ct., NAI Wisinski of West Michigan said last week. 
Empire — which also has locations in Byron Center, Kentucky, Canada and Mexico — will likely be adding new hires to fill its space, which it moved into this month, said Steve Marcusse, principal at Colliers International | West Michigan , who represented Empire . 
Granco Industiral used to be in the space, Marcusse said.
